body_html:
The ground truth labels, they are integer's denoting the location of the proper class index.

I believe did [ preds - labels ] ^ 2 (this is backwards, but shouldn't matter due to the square) with the integers here:

 self.diff = tf.subtract(self.predictions, self.targets)
 self.diff = tf.multiply(self.diff,self.diff, name='diff')

The ground truth labels, they are integer's denoting the location of the proper class index.
I believe did [ preds - labels ] ^ 2 (this is backwards, but shouldn't matter due to the square) with the integers here:
 self.diff = tf.subtract(self.predictions, self.targets)
 self.diff = tf.multiply(self.diff,self.diff, name='diff')
body:
The ground truth labels, they are integer's denoting the location of the proper class index.

I believe did [ preds - labels ] ^ 2 (this is backwards, but shouldn't matter due to the square) with the integers here: 

```
 self.diff = tf.subtract(self.predictions, self.targets)
 self.diff = tf.multiply(self.diff,self.diff, name='diff')
```
